\left(\begin{array}[]{l}\psi_{n}\\ \psi_{n+1}\end{array}\right)=\left(\begin{array}[]{cc}0&1\\ -1&-E+\epsilon_{n}\end{array}\right)\left(\begin{array}[]{l}\psi_{n-1}\\ \psi_{n}\end{array}\right)\equiv P_{n}\left(\begin{array}[]{l}\psi_{n-1}\\ \psi_{n}\end{array}\right).
